hmh.util

Class Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • hmh.util.Random

  • public class Random
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains Randonm Generators for all types of Numbers and String Sets in Addition to the java.util.Random Commands.
    Author:
    Oracle (Java APIs), Habeeb Hooshmand
